modName: Novice Mage Follower of Setvi - Skyrim
summary:
Description:
Add a female Breton (set as essential) follower in Riverwood.

Location:
Sleeping Giant Inn.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi[/url][/size][/b][color=#ead1dc][size=4][b][u]

Description:
[/u][/b][b][u]Add a female Breton (set as essential) follower in Riverwood.
[/u][/b][b][u]
[/u][/b][b][u]Location:
[/u][/b][b][u]Sleeping Giant Inn.
[/u][/b][b][u]
[/u][/b][b][u]Spells & special abilities:
[/u][/b][b][u]Flames
[/u][/b][b][u]Healing.
[/u][/b][b][u]
[/u][/b][b][u]Perk:
[/u][/b][b][u]Light Foot.
[/u][/b][b][u]

[/u][/b][b][u]1-81.
[/u][/b][b][u]

[/u][/b][b][u]

[/u][/b][b][u]Can marry.
[/u][/b][b][u]Templar from High Rock.
[/u][/b][b][u]Can be done in Light Armor, if someone want.
[/u][/b][b][u]Can be done in French, if someone want.
[/u][/b][b][u]Brave.
[/u][/b][b][u]
[/u][/b][b][u]DLC & Required:
[/u][/b][b][u]Nothing.[/u][/b][/size][/color][/center]
